idea-plugin.name: DynamicReturnTypePlugin
idea-plugin.description:
Intellij/Phpstorm PHP plugin to allow a dynamic return type from method/function calls. It can use either the instance type of the passed parameter or a string lookup. Full documentation with examples on github page. Can be configured for :
  • Instance method calls
  • Static method calls
  • Function calls
Accepts the following to calculate return type
  • Parameter object type
  • Parameter string type
  • Class constants that resolve to __CLASS__
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.1

  • Cache internal lookups for method calls in inheritance look ups as phpindex can lockup on some actions

1.0.2 ( make compatible with 6.0.3 open api changes so major restructuring, please leave a comment if any problems )

  • Configuration changes of the dynamicReturnTypeMeta.json configuration file in the root are done on the save event so may be sticky.
  • Please keep an eye on methods that have the same names return type being overwritten, if not a complete match it should defer back to the original return type.
  • Should now be completely lock up safe as there is no file/phpindex lookups which in the original getType implementation which caused the problems.
